property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Mecha Thunders. ■ Whenever this creature blocks, untap it after it battles. ■ This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each creature in the battle zone has "slayer." (Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Search your deck. You may take a creature that has Dragon in its race from your deck and put it into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck. That creature has "speed attacker." At the end of the turn, destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. If it has Dragon in its race, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. Then you may choose one of your creatures in the battle zone. If you do, it can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose up to 2 of your creatures in the battle zone. At the end of the turn, you may untap them. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TURBO RUSH} (If any of your other creatures broke any shields this turn, this creature gets its Turbo Rush ability until the end of the turn.) Whenever this creature attacks, you may look at 2 of your opponent's shields. Then put them back where they were.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't be attacked by any creature that has Dragon in its race.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Creatures that have power 3000 or more can't attack. (Creatures that have power less than 3000 and get extra power while attacking can still attack.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever a player casts a spell, this creature gets +3000 power until the end of the turn. (Do what the spell says before this creature gets the extra power.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TURBO RUSH} (If any of your other creatures broke any shields this turn, this creature gets its Turbo Rush ability until the end of the turn.) Whenever this creature is attacking your opponent and isn't blocked, untap all your creatures in the battle zone except 'Solar Grasses'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever any of your creatures attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. (First choose what your creature is attacking. Then choose a creature to tap.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may draw a card for each other tapped creature you have in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Draw a card. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at your opponent's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TURBO RUSH} (If any of your other creatures broke any shields this turn, this creature gets its Turbo Rush ability until the end of the turn.) This creature can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may look at your opponent's hand and at the top card of his deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your creatures in the battle zone can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TURBO RUSH} (If any of your other creatures broke any shields this turn, this creature gets its Turbo Rush ability until the end of the turn.) When this creature attacks, search your deck. You may take a card from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. If it has Dragon in its race, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put a creature from your graveyard into your hand. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your opponent chooses and discards 2 cards from his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return all creatures that have Dragon in their race from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TURBO RUSH} (If any of your other creatures broke any shields this turn, this creature gets its Turbo Rush ability until the end of the turn.) Whenever this creature is attacking your opponent and isn't blocked, you may destroy a creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TURBO RUSH} (If any of your other creatures broke any shields this turn, this creature gets its Turbo Rush ability until the end of the turn.) Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent discards his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put another creature into the battle zone, destroy this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your shields and put it into your graveyard. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature battles, destroy it after the battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you put a Dragonoid or a creature that has Dragon in its race into the battle zone, destroy the creature that has the least power in the battle zone. If there's a tie, you choose from among the tied creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put another creature into the battle zone, destroy this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature is destroyed, choose one of your shields and put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Until the end of the turn, each of your Dragonoids in the battle zone is an Armored Dragon in addition to its other races, gets +4000 power, and has "Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields)."

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may put a creature that has Dragon in its race from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TURBO RUSH} (If any of your other creatures broke any shields this turn, this creature gets its Turbo Rush ability until the end of the turn.) This creature can attack untapped creatures and has "Power attacker +4000 (While attacking, this creature gets +4000 power)."

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't be attacked. ■ This creature can't attack players. {POWER ATTACKER} +1000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TURBO RUSH} (If any of your other creatures broke any shields this turn, this creature gets its Turbo Rush ability until the end of the turn.) Whenever this creature attacks, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power for each other tapped creature you have in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each creature in the battle zone that has Dragon in its race has "speed attacker." (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you put a Dragonoid or a creature that has Dragon in its race into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TURBO RUSH} (If any of your other creatures broke any shields this turn, this creature gets its Turbo Rush ability until the end of the turn.) Whenever this creature is attacking your opponent and becomes blocked, it breaks one of your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature becomes blocked, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature would be destroyed, if you have a creature that has Dragon in its race in your mana zone, put this creature into your mana zone instead of destroying it. Then return a creature that has Dragon in its race from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +3000 power until the end of the turn. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever another creature is put into the battle zone, this creature gets +3000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever any of your creatures would be destroyed this turn, put it into your mana zone instead. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TURBO RUSH} (If any of your other creatures broke any shields this turn, this creature gets its Turbo Rush ability until the end of the turn.) This creature gets +5000 power and has "double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields)."

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent may choose a creature in his hand and put it into the battle zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {POWER ATTACKER} +3000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When one of your shields would be broken, you may destroy this creature instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Cyber Lords. ■ Whenever your opponent uses the "shield trigger" ability of one of his shields, draw up to 2 cards.
